Do activities with your child. Repeat the names of objects and ask questions about them ("Where does this animal live?", "What does this fruit taste like?"). This supports language development and strengthens your bond.
Uygulama ilk açılışta otomatik olarak \": On first launch, the app automatically creates a "Guest" profile. If you want to track multiple children separately, you can create new profiles from the Settings menu or switch between existing profiles.
Uygulamanın görünümünü değiştirin. 'Tema: Change the look of the app. 'Themed' mode has lively backgrounds, while 'Simple' mode offers a softer palette.
Geri bildirimleri kısaltır ve etkinlikle: Shortens feedback and speeds transitions between activities.
Çocuğunuz bir görseli sevmiyorsa, Ayarla: If your child dislikes an image, enable "Ban Image" in Settings and use the ban button during activities to hide it later.
Çocuğunuzun hangi kategorilerde ustalaşt: Shows which categories your child has mastered. Earn a badge by completing an activity perfectly 3 times!
Çocuğunuz için en zorlayıcı ve en başarı: Highlights the most challenging and most successful activities for your child.
Çocuğunuzun ihtiyaçlarını, duygularını v: Help your child express needs, feelings, or requests using the Communication Cards section.
Ayarlar'daki Etkinlik Yönetimi'ni kullan: Use Activity Management in Settings to focus on specific skills or temporarily disable activities your child is not ready for.
Farklı kategorilerden tüm etkinleştirilm: Presents a shuffled mix of all enabled exercises from different categories to reinforce learning in a fun way.
Yakında çocuğunuzun en çok zorlandığı et: Soon you'll be able to start a 'Practice Session' based on the activities your child struggles with the most.
Çoraptan sonra ne giyeriz?: What do we wear after socks?

Makarnayı ne ile yeriz?: What do we use to eat pasta?
